FuncDef: The display ops process command displays information about an OPS process. The display ops process command displays information about an OPS process.

ParaDef.Info:
The operation method.
current: brief information about a specified OPS task that is being executed.history: information about a historical OPS task.verbose: detailed information about a specified OPS task that is being executed.

ExtraInfo: To view information about an OPS process, run the display ops process command.
